laboratory_examinations.findings: A new left-sided PICC line was placed; the tip of the line projects over the cavoatrial junction with no evidence of complications. A small parenchymal opacity at the right lung base is constant and unchanged; no other parenchymal changes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The small parenchymal opacity at the right lung base is constant and unchanged compared to the previous radiograph.
